extendedInfo.description: Making decisions can be confusing and difficult at times. We built this app to assist in making decisions in a structured and fun manner. With Right Decisions, you make a decision on your own or together with another person using one of the available pre-built decision templates.A decision is validated from your perspective by judging how each option measures up to the different criteria.After evaluation, Right Decisions performs an analysis and reports back with the winning option. The winning option is the one ranked as the best in satisfying the criteria. Afterwards, you may review the decision or save it for future reference.We look forward to receiving your feedback and we hope that you'll find this app helpful and enjoyable to use.Thanks for downloading Right Decisions!By downloading this app you agree to the End User License Agreement at https://sites.google.com/site/demaapps/home/eulakeywords: decisions, decision making, yes or no, true or false, different options, multiple criteria

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Crashes on my Droid M as soon as I open the app and click on a button. The developer\'s other Moodometer app does the same thing.
reviews.author: Shannon S
